code: public void handle(HttpRequest request, HttpResponse response, HttpContext context) throws HttpException, IOException {     response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_OK).     response.setEntity(new StringEntity("OK", Consts.ISO_8859_1)). }

@BeforeClass public static void setUp() throws Exception {     localServer = new HttpTestServer(null, null).     localServer.register("/", new HttpRequestHandler() {          public void handle(HttpRequest request, HttpResponse response, HttpContext context) throws HttpException, IOException {             response.setStatusCode(HttpStatus.SC_OK).             response.setEntity(new StringEntity("OK", Consts.ISO_8859_1)).         }     }).     localServer.start(). }
@AfterClass public static void tearDown() throws Exception {     if (localServer != null) {         localServer.stop().     } }
@Test public void testMocksIsValid() throws Exception {     mock.expectedMessageCount(1).     producer.sendBody(null).     mock.assertIsSatisfied(). }
